refnamediv.refpurpose: Transfers image data from the specified rectangle of the specified layer or buffer to a different location of another specified layer or buffer, using the specified transfer function.

para.command: transfer SRCLAYER SRCX SRCY SRCWIDTH SRCHEIGHT FUNCTION DSTLAYER DSTX DSTY

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Transfers image data from the specified rectangle of the specified layer or buffer to a different location of another specified layer or buffer, using the specified transfer function. For a list of available functions guacamole/protocol.h.
